website_summaries.verdict: An impressive catalog, cross-device syncing, and in-app purchases make Comics for Android app the first name in digital comic book reading apps.
pros: Most new books available the same day as print issues
Syncs content across PCs and mobile devices
cons: Gift cards, subscriptions, bundles, and DRM-free backups not supported (only available via website)

customer_reviews.title: Good app
customer_reviews.text: Great app.if you have a big enough device it's the same as reading a comic. The guided view is good if you have a smaller device. The service has an excellent range of comics and the app works really well.
customer_reviews.author: S. Bentley

customer_reviews.title: A useful app for comics
customer_reviews.text: This app has been useful for being able to get back into reading comics, something I used to do regularly during commutes to university. Since finishing and having less storage space to work with and no nearby comic shops this app has been a good solution to all 3 issues. The selection of comics and art books is good with some going on sale regularly.
customer_reviews.author: B. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is the best app of its kind that I have used. I am able to fully immerse myself in the content without glitches or pop ups, just glides from panel to panel. Almost as good as holding the paper comic in my hands!
customer_reviews.author: Worcestershire Lad.

customer_reviews.title: Comixology customer service except Amazon and Purina.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, some good value to be fpund, they have hiked the prices up so it matches sterling to the US dollar which is a bit cheeky.
customer_reviews.author: A Hume

customer_reviews.title: Must have for comic/manga readers
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, lots of comics and most important for me manga. The usually have deals on as well. I'd say it's good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Monkeylover

customer_reviews.title: Good app for reading and buying comics
customer_reviews.text: Good app for reading and buying comics but it would be nice if you could have recently downloaded comics and in progress comics appear on the Kindle fire home screen like Kindle books and Amazon prime videos do...
customer_reviews.author: William Hawley

customer_reviews.title: Solid place to start for a first time comic buyer
customer_reviews.text: I've always been a fan from outside the comic book window looking in, and now I get to sit at the table and enjoy lunch with the likes of Superman and Spiderman...best not to think about that analogy too hard.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Useful app to preview comics.
customer_reviews.text: Useful way to read comics on the Kindle Fire. There are lots of free comics as well as free previews but if you want the best or latest or complete set, you have to pay for it obviously. I enjoyed using the app to preview comics I may consider buying. The colour and details are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: asocrates

customer_reviews.title: Amazing choice of comics and graphic novels
customer_reviews.text: Amazing choice of comics and graphic novels. I got this application because Amazon seem to be struggling to keep alot of publishers using the kindle system, probably due to their ongoing price war. So I now can download Marvel content, Walking Dead graphic novels, which is why I bought the Kindle in the first place!
customer_reviews.author: James Kendrick

customer_reviews.title: Great for mainstream comics.
customer_reviews.text: For me this is the best way to read comics, no storage problems, lots of regular sales so it can be much cheaper than buying print copies. Reading one panel at a time is also easier on the eyes.
customer_reviews.author: m d bannister

customer_reviews.title: Won't let you read comics unless you've bought them through the app
customer_reviews.text: A comic book reader that won't let you read your own comics. Completely pointless- the idea is to tie you in to buying all your comics from one source, and has nothing to do with providing an app to read comics. Want to read your old comics? tough luck.
customer_reviews.author: M. C. Millard

customer_reviews.title: Awesome app!
customer_reviews.text: Love Comixology, there are always sales in which makes it more affordable than physical copies. Guide view is also a great feature, letting you zoom panel to panel.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Paul W McLoone

customer_reviews.title: SUPPOSED TO BE BEST ON MARKET.
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey for the comics but was expecting that. Ap works well. Quality is good. Range of subject matter is impressive. Looking forward to ordering comics soon. Billing through my Amazon make a lot of sense and make the process painless as I am used to dealing with Amazon for music and kindle books.
customer_reviews.author: We Big Man

customer_reviews.title: Comics on Fire
customer_reviews.text: Very extensive covering all publishers of merit - I was only looking for 'Dark Horse' so was pleased to see such good coverage of most pop comics & Graphic novels . Great! Present great on my Fire HD !
customer_reviews.author: Peder

customer_reviews.title: exellent
customer_reviews.text: exellent way to READ COMICS WHITHOUT THE PHYSCIAL STORAGE PROBLEM
customer_reviews.author: Dylan G

customer_reviews.title: Your Comics anytime, anywhere!
customer_reviews.text: The best way to read comics is to buy a copy. The next best way is Comixology. A brilliant app that let's me read all my favourite comic books anytime, anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Davies

customer_reviews.title: Dissappointed that you have to pay for each volume
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed I hoped it would be a subscription service like the shonen jump app, but upon finding out you have to buy the individual volumes I decided not to use the app, as I'd rather just pay for the physical books.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Coutanche

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this app for a few years now, and I've found its brilliant for reading comics - especially while traveling
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this site since i got it and have found some really good quality comics, but i have not been ablke to access the follow on parts to the free series. That i find dissappointing.
customer_reviews.author: marva

customer_reviews.title: Nice one
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, able to be up to date with all comic books, when the shops in the UK are around a year behind
customer_reviews.author: mr S COLLIER

customer_reviews.title: A good app for reading and acquiring electronic comics
customer_reviews.text: A good app if you like reading comics electronically. There are also free comics as well as the ones you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: YFM

customer_reviews.title: Great for anyone into comics.
customer_reviews.text: I've procrastinated over getting this for ages, but I'm glad I finally took the plunge. Loads of comics, both old and new and it works pretty well on my Kindle Fire.
customer_reviews.author: Will Pollard

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant. easy to use, and keep track of what you have, all sorted alphabetically.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Folders please.
customer_reviews.text: This app is very close to the android one. Better in the sense that you can pay with Amazon but the featured tiles at the front aren't always up to date and some sales don't show up so I need to buy off the website or my phone. Also would like the option to rearrange and name folders for comics and to choose which cover to use as the cover of the folder. Please make this happen as app would become 5 stars with this one addition.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Cecil

customer_reviews.title: loving it
customer_reviews.text: this app is a must for any comic book fan loads of good deals and selection of comics ive only had my kindle fire hdx for a week and just haven't come off it been reading so much highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Matthew tite

customer_reviews.title: Good App For Comics
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes a little awkward to find titles in your library but no major problems. It's great being able to buy straight through the app and as others have mentioned it works well on kindle.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Hollingdale

customer_reviews.title: Great 👍
customer_reviews.text: Excellent app. Works well on kindle, free comics every month. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Very good but a little cumbersome in places
customer_reviews.text: Very good but a little cumbersome in places. For example functionality when there is no Wi-Fi connection and general ease of use ( lack of options) in organising one's library. Small points.
customer_reviews.author: GS

customer_reviews.title: great app
customer_reviews.text: It's great to have access to so many comic books in one place. But I would have liked the books to properly download onto my tablet so I feel that I properly possess my own copies.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Sloan

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic app! The app has so many great publishers available on it. The only disappointing thing is Rebellion is not included. Also loads of free comics and most of the single issues are well priced.
customer_reviews.author: Allan Benzies

customer_reviews.title: Not as intuitive as I would like but the sales are good
customer_reviews.text: They could do with making making the app more streamline
customer_reviews.author: Matthew McDyre

customer_reviews.title: A must have for comic fans
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to save on my bookshelf, and found it to be an amazing app. I can buy the comic through my amazon account which is really helpful and can subscribe so I don't have to find a comic shop. A fantastic app.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great app to use on my amazon fire 10 tablet 🤗🤓❤
customer_reviews.text: Excellent app and supported on my amazon fireHD10 tablet 👏👍❤
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth C.

customer_reviews.title: used to be brilliant now keeps crashing
customer_reviews.text: Used to love this app since updates won't load up and keeps crashing. So can't even read the comics I've already bought. Please fix this as used to love this app.
customer_reviews.author: sean devlin

customer_reviews.title: Would be lost without it.
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this app! I buy and read dozens of comics and graphic novels, I am an absolute addict and this app is perfect. I use it on my phone and tablet every single day.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality app and store
customer_reviews.text: This app has reconnected me with my appreciation of comics in a 21at century format.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Hurn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent app. I've used it for years on other ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent app. I've used it for years on other devices and can't fault it. I'd your into comics you must get this app.
customer_reviews.author: Han

customer_reviews.title: i love comics .
customer_reviews.text: this is a great app ,good choice and the reading of the comic is easily followed ,this is the best app ive got !
customer_reviews.author: A. Mills

customer_reviews.title: Great but...
customer_reviews.text: I just wish the comics thought showed in my kindle library
customer_reviews.author: Philip Delaney

customer_reviews.title: Great app
customer_reviews.text: Just like having a comic in my hand. Love it..
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: Best way to read comics as there are always great discounts on comics I love!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love it. The guided view really makes this app great.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent app
customer_reviews.text: Easy to navigate. Good store. Best guided view function I've found. All round excellent app.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Savant

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy
customer_reviews.text: Great on tablets, needs work on the publishers tab though
customer_reviews.author: Ian Syme

customer_reviews.title: good app
customer_reviews.text: Good app for reading comics on kindle fire hd ( large screen). Graphics and text sharper and easier to read than on my 17" laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Redrawn

customer_reviews.title: awesome app plays perfectly on my daughters kindle hd
customer_reviews.text: awesome app plays perfectly on my daughters kindle hd. quality is so good it's like holding a real comic. real big fan of this app.
customer_reviews.author: Geraint

customer_reviews.title: Great, but could be perfect
customer_reviews.text: Good app, would be great if they could create a Marvel Unlimited like subscription service though.
customer_reviews.author: bhillybillybob

customer_reviews.title: It would be much better if it had a zoom function with it
customer_reviews.text: I only have a 7" tablet. It would be much better if it had a zoom function with it. I can't read a damn thing!!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. J. Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Very good, but could be better.
customer_reviews.text: Simple and easy to use. Although could do with having the Sale section like the website.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything a comic fan needs!
customer_reviews.text: Great app has all the single issues, collections and lesser known comics i have ever wanted to read and you can also get new issues the day they are released in print
customer_reviews.author: shaun coils

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A great list for those like me getting back to comics, and graphic novels.
customer_reviews.author: Shifty One

customer_reviews.title: Favourite comic apo
customer_reviews.text: Great app. Only prob is sales offers on website arent available on app
customer_reviews.author: Andy Graham

customer_reviews.title: Great for comic fans
customer_reviews.text: Huge range of comics, saves a lot of space and you can read them anywhere you want to.
customer_reviews.author: Kodi

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Free 1 are ok but u have to pay the the rest of the series
customer_reviews.author: Mr D Doran

customer_reviews.title: Great app
customer_reviews.text: Great app and all your comics in one nice place.
customer_reviews.author: Kane

customer_reviews.title: Excellent app
customer_reviews.text: Originally had some trouble getting my Marvel comics back catalogue up but had fantastic help off help desk and now have everything Great app.
customer_reviews.author: c.collins

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely for a comic fan who likes to read comics in the go!
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and a great collection of comics to read.
customer_reviews.author: Liakat Khan

customer_reviews.title: Great app
customer_reviews.text: Great app for any comic fan easy to use and brilliant choice of a wide range of comics. A must have
customer_reviews.author: STUART MUSGRAVE

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: good app, the store has LOADS of comics. just what i needed :)
customer_reviews.author: LZM

customer_reviews.title: Well displayed and easy to read
customer_reviews.text: Always used comixology since I stopped buying paper comics. Well displayed and easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Start building your comic book collection
customer_reviews.text: Great free app! Very easy to use, nice layout with a huge library of comics to purchase for your collection.
customer_reviews.author: conor robertson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great app with great comics a must have for super hero fans, five stars.
customer_reviews.author: maff

customer_reviews.title: A very good Comic Reader app
customer_reviews.text: This app gives you access to all content purchased from Comixology. I've been using their apps across various tabs for several years, both before and since they were acquired by Amazon. The guidedview tech is amongst the best in a reader and perfect for navigating a comic, the content is in very high quality and there is an abundance of content with most content from major publishers released day and date with their print editions. Overall an excellent app and well worth a look
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Trebell

customer_reviews.title: At last!
customer_reviews.text: I can access my comic book faves on my Kindle Fire HD. The purchase process is easy and the selection is impressive. Visually they are a treat to read. If I have one grumble it would be that they are not significantly cheaper than paper editions.
customer_reviews.author: A. C. Delso

customer_reviews.title: but I'm annoyed by how it constantly bombards me with Comixology Unlimited ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well, but I'm annoyed by how it constantly bombards me with Comixology Unlimited despite that service not even being offered in the UK.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: finally
customer_reviews.text: I have been waiting a while now for this app to come to kindle. I think the app is very good and if you like comics it can be a good way to read them. However, I could not seem to get the sale items on kindle (they do weekly sales etc) and had to buy directly from the website.
customer_reviews.author: Morpheus

customer_reviews.title: A real winner of an app
customer_reviews.text: It's a great app for reading comics or graphic novels on the phone but having bought myself a 10" kindle fire for xmas this app has really come into its own. The ability to read up close then pan out to full spread is a great addition to it and I have to admit I've shelled out for comics I wouldn't have bought without that aspect. Links to my Marvel and DC purchases and the library is very intuitive too. Free comics is a winner and they also have really reasonable offers.
customer_reviews.author: lee bone

customer_reviews.title: limited
customer_reviews.text: I downloaded this so that I could sync my existing comic collection with my kindle. I wanted to be able to read them away from my computer. No such luck - and I gave up trying. It does show the comics properly and for anyone who is happy just to download the comics they have in store, it will probably be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Edward G Gordon

customer_reviews.title: great app for comics!!!
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant, glad it's been released again, I can now download all my comics on to my kindle fire!!!! Please don't remove it again!
customer_reviews.author: MQ

customer_reviews.title: A great app but....
customer_reviews.text: The app itself is very good. Clean looking, easy to navigate and everything where you expect it to be. My only reason for not giving it five stars is that everything I went looking for simply was not available.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great app
customer_reviews.text: App is great to read your comics if your stuck for room and nowhere to store physical copies , good range of indy comics on here that you may struggle to get in your local comic shop
customer_reviews.author: Steve W

customer_reviews.title: Comixology at last!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: At long last this app is available in the UK! This now ensures all my reading material is available in one place. Well done Amazon for listening to your British users at long last. COMIXOLOGY offers readers a great choice at very good prices, although do check as sometimes cheaper to purchase titles over your desktop than through the app! Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: MKC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent app for comic downloads
customer_reviews.text: Great app for comic downloads, brilliant design and easy to navigate. Highly recommended for all you comic fans out there.
customer_reviews.author: w a nixon

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Some cost too much but then some are free so a good service overall and then easily readable and works well on the kindle
customer_reviews.author: Jdsmith680

customer_reviews.title: where's 2000ad?
customer_reviews.text: One of my better choices in apps. This is updated every day and has loads of comics and graphic novels. Would love to have a little bit more British ones but still gets a five star.
customer_reviews.author: Jim the new man.

customer_reviews.title: Works a treat!
customer_reviews.text: Great app, like having the biggest comic book shop ever in the palm of your hand. Only issue now is trying to maintain enough will power not to drain the old bank account catching up on lapsed series's, and favourite artists/writers.
customer_reviews.author: Mr D M J Gladwin

customer_reviews.title: Good app but poor delivery
customer_reviews.text: Why no UK subscription? Makes reading in the UK a very expensive proposition, particularly when it's such a limited proprietary format
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this app
customer_reviews.text: I love this app, I have been using it on all my devices for several years, very consistent, fast and easy to use. All my favourite comics in one place. However, you cannot save comics to an external memory card. Offers free comics and comics without DRM (digital rights management). Guided and full page views work well for the most part.
customer_reviews.author: MrJohnUK

customer_reviews.title: Great for Avid comic book fans
customer_reviews.text: I use this to manage my digital comics collection, particularly the digital copies you get free with the DC monthly comics at the moment, but it is also a great place to collect all of the comics you have bought from different digital media, and i am intrigued by the potential of moving from physical to digital subscriptions.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Wont Let You View Comics Outside Amazon Store
customer_reviews.text: Good app but I have lots of comics from other sources and this app wont let you view them. I dont like this 'closed shop' practice.
customer_reviews.author: Tomrockstar

customer_reviews.title: Could be a great app but only let's you view what you buy from them
customer_reviews.text: Could be good but unless you buy from them it won't let you read any you already have so useless to me. I have a large collection already so will use comicat
customer_reviews.author: HarbingerUK

customer_reviews.title: Good, but needs some tweaks
customer_reviews.text: App strangely doesn't highlight any of the deals that criminology does, which i can see on my android device. Also needs the option to custom organise comics. I'd like to be able to order my comics by publisher, or group series which continue on from each other.I Otherwise, solid app.
customer_reviews.author: A. Houten

customer_reviews.title: can not read your existing cbr files
customer_reviews.text: Good if you want to buy new material but forgot about viewing your existing car collection which you may have purchased by other means. Useless for my needs
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Kunu Miah

customer_reviews.title: Bad version of a great app
customer_reviews.text: The android version of this app has an option for HD books that is missing here, meaning the versions of my comics I get on my PHONE are superior to the ones on my kindle. That being said. Comixology remains the best provider of digital comics anywhere. This is just not the best version of their app.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. A. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Very good app
customer_reviews.text: I love this app. Easy to navigate and a good selection of free comics available. It is also good to see a selection of comics from other companies besides Marvel and DC. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Howard

customer_reviews.title: brilliant
customer_reviews.text: love the fact that you can own some all classics. hopefully some more 2000ad and foreign comics will be soon available.
customer_reviews.author: papillonsh

customer_reviews.title: Mostly good
customer_reviews.text: The app is touchy still has a few bugs. When I turn off and on it sometimes forgets I've downloaded anything and downloads sometime stop Otherwise it's very good and much better than the actual website for reading comics, not so good for finding them. It will save money and space for you
customer_reviews.author: sithlord56

customer_reviews.title: Great for reading on the go
customer_reviews.text: This app is great; they have all the major and most of the minor publishers, it links to your Marvel account and I love the 99c sales!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Yeates

customer_reviews.title: Great for reading but admin isn't as easy as the site.
customer_reviews.text: Prices are good and the comic view is good too. The admin side of things is less good; sales are less easily found, removing more than one comic is painful, and if you want to take advantage of sales or even just buy multiple comics it doesn't even come close to matching the sites functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for tablets
customer_reviews.text: Guided reading is a nice addition. Brings comics into 21st cent. Ideal for tablets readfing Brought me back to comics after a long layoff
customer_reviews.author: Dalton768

customer_reviews.title: This has obviously been needed for a long long time
customer_reviews.text: Not so good with special edition of Batman Killing Joke But Otherwise , Seems Ok So far Nice Cinematique transitions ......
customer_reviews.author: Mr. D. J. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Tried this in order to save money on buying hard copies but, honestly, the experience just doesn't work for me. I like to see the whole page/s before reading the words. Maybe I'm a bit old fashioned.
customer_reviews.author: Pete C

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Until there is an app for Dark Horse comics this will suffice. But sadly even though this app covers most of the same titles as Dark Horse if you have some previous purchases on Dark Horse using there own app you cannot pick them up on this and therefore you would have to buy them again. So I would ask Amazon to add the d/ h app as soon as possible giving comic lovers more choice.
customer_reviews.author: jeff wood

customer_reviews.title: I love comics and I love Comixology!
customer_reviews.text: I love Comixology. It has fantastic content and lovely fluid reading with guided view. It can be expensive but there are plenty of sales to make things more affordable. I bought a fire hd 8 and it's the perfect portable size and my comics look stunning on it. I have had only one problem that was basically my own fault and customer service helped me quickly sort it out. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Martin H.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT... BUT WATCH OUT!
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for about 24hrs and then crashed, taking all the comics I'd downloaded with it. So, great viewer, enabling you to zoom in anywhere on the page, flip double page spreads to landscape -- and probably has loads of other undiscovered features -- but not field tested enough before releasing into the wild. Or are we unpaid testers? I see other people have had these issues too. I like the app when it's working, so will keep an eye out to see if it gets fixed/upgraded. Three stars for the abilities mentioned above... five stars when it becomes a fully stabilized beastie.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Paris

customer_reviews.title: no sales
customer_reviews.text: Being a being a northerner I'm tight And after hopping from the website to the app I released the prices are different. Not a single sale is advertised within the app....and worse any comics that are in a sale the app will allow you to buy full price. Shocking! I will never buy from within this app, as cannot trust it.
customer_reviews.author: austers.ball

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant controls but can only backup some of the comics
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant controls and reading experience but it has stopped downloading to KindleFire SD so now I have had to stop using Comixology which is a real shame looking for alternatives Update ComiXolgy support replied with the solution/work around make sure the app is fully on the device and not part on the SD then reboot worked a treat now if they would sort the backup so you can backup all your comics and just some of them it would be perfect
customer_reviews.author: AJSBSA

customer_reviews.title: but its basically like another amazon book shop
customer_reviews.text: This wasn't what I expected. I thought I'd be able to import comics I'd bought elsewhere that are saved to my SD card, but its basically like another amazon book shop.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy_Maloo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Son loved this app, enabled him to read all his favourite commits whilst travelling. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Book Guys
